# UITextItem.Content.tag(_:)

**Case**

A string that represents a custom tag for a topic.

## Declaration

```swift
case tag(String)
```

## Parameters

- **tag**: The tag that the text item represents.

## Getting the content type

- **UITextItem.Content.link(_:)**: A link to a resource, such as an item on a remote server or the path to a local file.
- **UITextItem.Content.textAttachment(_:)**: A text attachment, such as an image or view.

items.description: A link to a resource, such as an item on a remote server or the path to a local file.
items.name: UITextItem.Content.link(_:)

items.description: A text attachment, such as an image or view.
items.name: UITextItem.Content.textAttachment(_:)
